entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 12 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19 except minus 12 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7 except minus 1 near the Alberta border.
